nirfasterff.forward.femdata

The FEM solvers. It is usually recommended to use the high-level wrappers in the mesh classes by calling the mesh.femdata* functions.

Functions

femdata_DCS(mesh, tvec[, solver, opt])

Forward modeling calculating steady-state fluences and G1/g1 curves by solving the correlation diffusion equation.

femdata_fl_CW(mesh[, solver, opt, xflag, ...])

Forward modeling for CW in fluorescence meshes.

femdata_fl_FD(mesh, freq[, solver, opt, ...])

Forward modeling for FD in fluorescence meshes.

femdata_fl_TR(mesh, tmax, dt[, savefield, ...])

Forward modeling calculating TPSF on a fluorescence mesh.

femdata_fl_TR_moments(mesh[, max_moments, ...])

Forward modeling calculating TR moments using Mellin transform on a fluorescence mesh.

femdata_stnd_CW(mesh[, solver, opt])

Forward modeling for CW.

femdata_stnd_FD(mesh, freq[, solver, opt])

Forward modeling for FD.

femdata_stnd_TR(mesh, tmax, dt[, savefield, ...])

Forward modeling calculating TPSF on a standard mesh.

femdata_stnd_TR_moments(mesh[, max_moments, ...])

Forward modeling calculating TR moments using Mellin transform on a standard mesh.
